suite.doc: Test and verify if login is invalid

suite.name: 003 Invalid Login Json

kw.name: Load JSON From File
kw.doc: Load JSON from file.
kw.msg: ${json_obj} = {'users': [{'username': 'locked_out_user', 'password': 'secret_sauce', 'error': 'Sorry, this user has been locked out.'}, {'username': 'standard_user', 'password': '', 'error': 'Password is required'}...

kw.name: Convert JSON To String
kw.doc: Convert JSON object to string
kw.msg: ${json_str} = {"users": [{"username": "locked_out_user", "password": "secret_sauce", "error": "Sorry, this user has been locked out."}, {"username": "standard_user", "password": "", "error": "Password is required"}...

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.
kw.msg: ${data} = {'users': [{'username': 'locked_out_user', 'password': 'secret_sauce', 'error': 'Sorry, this user has been locked out.'}, {'username': 'standard_user', 'password': '', 'error': 'Password is required'}...

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
kw.msg: ${data} = {'users': [{'username': 'locked_out_user', 'password': 'secret_sauce', 'error': 'Sorry, this user has been locked out.'}, {'username': 'standard_user', 'password': '', 'error': 'Password is required'}...

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

suite.name: 004 Invalid Login Db

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using `dbName`, `dbUsername`, and `dbPassword`.
kw.msg: Connecting using : pymysql.connect(db=db_test, user=root, passwd=, host=127.0.0.1, port=3306, charset=None)
OperationalError: (2003, "Can't connect to MySQL server on '127.0.0.1' ([WinError 10061] No connection could be made because the target machine actively refused it)")

test.name: Check Login For Invalid Crendential Through Database
test.status: Parent suite setup failed: OperationalError: (2003, "Can't connect to MySQL server on '127.0.0.1' ([WinError 10061] No connection could be made because the target machine actively refused it)")

kw.name: Disconnect From Database
kw.doc: Disconnects from the database.

suite.doc: Test and verify if login is invalid & fetch data from database
suite.status:
